description:
Drupal Panels - Go Beyond the Basic Layout

So you use Drupal, and have heard of Panels. Maybe you have even seen them in action, but you don't know the ins and outs yet.

Maybe you are tired of being confined to placing your content in Sidebar Second, or Triptych Middle, or any other built-in block region. Or maybe you want different layouts for different roles, permissions, or situations.

If that sounds like you, then you are going to want to take this course.

In this Panels course you will:

  • Create Layouts Using Built-in Layout Categories
  • Create Custom Layouts
  • Easily Update Settings with the In-Place Editor
  • Modify Content & Variant Settings
  • Use Stylizer


This is a No Code course for Panel beginners. If you are looking to add CSS (beyond the Stylizer), or PHP, this might not be the course for you.

Take a look at the curriculum, see if this course is for you.

I'd love to have you in class, so if it is, scroll up and click the ENROLL button, because you can take your layout to the next level this week!
title: Drupal Panels: Introduction to Creating Custom Layouts
